item.title: 谷歌正在寻找 ChatGPT 的答案
item.description:
互联网上最受欢迎的产品正在发生巨大的变化，Google（和网络）可能从此面目全非。【原文：

Big changes are underway for the internet’s most popular product, and Google (and the web) may never be the same.

】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长埃斯克里瓦称下行风险大于上行风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员何塞-路易斯-埃斯克里瓦（Jose Luis Escriva）表示，欧元区经济预测面临的下行风险大于上行风险。【原文：Risks to euro-zone economic forecasts are more to the downside than the upside, according to European Central Bank Governing Council member Jose Luis Escriva.】

item.title: 美国电力公司发行 20 亿美元股票
item.description: 美国电力公司正在发行 20 亿美元的普通股。【原文：American Electric Power Co. is offering $2 billion in shares of its common stock.】

item.title: 土耳其财政部长将在连日市场疲软后召开投资者电话会议
item.description: 土耳其财政部长穆罕默德-西姆塞克（Mehmet Simsek）将于周二与国际投资者举行电话会议，熟悉内情的人士称，在一位重要反对派人士被捕引发的动荡局势持续数日之后，土耳其当局正试图安抚市场。【原文：Turkey’s Finance Minister Mehmet Simsek will hold a call with international investors on Tuesday, people familiar with the matter said, as authorities seek to calm markets following days of turbulence triggered by the arrest of a key opposition figure.】

item.title: 印度沙普尔吉公司就巴西国家石油公司取消招标一事向巴西发出呼吁
item.description: 在国营巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）取消石油生产平台建设招标后，印度 Shapoorji Pallonji 能源公司直接向巴西政府提出上诉。【原文：India’s Shapoorji Pallonji Energy is appealing directly to the Brazilian government after state-run Petrobras canceled a tender for construction of an oil production platform.】

item.title: 法国亿万富豪家族收购巴黎风险投资公司
item.description: 法国亿万富翁达索（Dassault）家族和萨德（Saade）家族正在收购风险投资公司 Founders Future 的股份，以加大科技投资力度。【原文：The French billionaire Dassault and Saade families are buying a stake in venture capital firm Founders Future as they step up tech investments.】

item.title: S&P公司称，肯尼亚未能通过国际货币基金组织（IMF）最终项目审查可能会推迟世界银行和阿联酋的资金到位时间
item.description: S&P全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）表示，肯尼亚未能达到国际货币基金组织（IMF）项目最终审查的关键目标，导致其放弃了约8.5亿美元的付款，这可能会导致其获得其他外部融资的延迟。【原文：Kenya’s failure to meet key targets in its final review under an International Monetary Fund program that led it to forfeit a disbursement of about $850 million may lead to delays in it obtaining other external financing, S&P Global Ratings said.】

item.title: F-35 飞行员外包商 Survitec 考虑在国防热潮中出售设备
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Searchlight Capital Partners 正在探索出售 Survitec 公司的航空航天和国防业务，该公司为 F-35 战斗机飞行员等提供安全和生存设备。【原文：Searchlight Capital Partners is exploring a sale of Survitec’s aerospace and defense business, which provides safety and survival equipment including for F-35 fighter pilots, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贝利说，英国需要人工智能走出增长缓慢的陷阱
item.description: 英国央行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）在莱斯特大学发表演讲时表示，英国需要人工智能等技术突破来应对长期增长率的崩溃。【原文：Britain needs a technological breakthrough such as artificial intelligence to counter the collapse in its long-term growth rate, Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey said in a lecture at Leicester University.】

item.title: 特朗普称将对汽车征收关税，并预言互惠减税
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统表示，他将在未来几天内宣布对进口汽车征收关税，并表示各国将从下周的 "对等 "关税中获得减免。【原文：President Donald Trump said he will announce tariffs on automobile imports in the coming days — and indicated nations will receive breaks from next week’s “reciprocal” tariffs.】

item.title: 澳大利亚总债务峰值下降，预算小幅上调
item.description: 周二的预算将显示，澳大利亚的债务总额将达到峰值，低于工党政府上台时的预期水平，财长吉姆-查莫斯（Jim Chalmers）表示，收入也将有小幅提升。【原文：Australia’s gross debt is set to peak at a lower level than anticipated when the Labor government took office, Tuesday’s budget will show, with Treasurer Jim Chalmers saying there’ll also be small revenue upgrades.】

item.title: 乔盖蒂称意大利无法摆脱债务约束
item.description: 意大利财政部长吉安卡洛-乔盖蒂（Giancarlo Giorgetti）说，由于意大利债台高筑，因此不能超支。【原文：Italy can’t spend beyond its means because of its mammoth debt, Finance Minister Giancarlo Giorgetti said.】

item.title: 美联储主席博斯蒂克认为关税将导致今年降息一次
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）表示，他现在认为今年只可能降息一次，而不是两次，关税上调阻碍了通货紧缩的进展。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic said he now sees just one interest-rate cut as likely this year, rather than two, with tariff hikes impeding progress on disinflation.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉削减政府工作周以配给电力
item.description: 由于高温影响了为水电站供电的大坝，委内瑞拉正在将公共办公时间缩短一半，以配给电力。【原文：Venezuela is cutting public office hours in half to ration electricity as high temperatures affect dams feeding hydropower plants, a move that threatens to further slow the nation’s economy amid threats of additional US sanctions.】

item.title: 宠物供应商派特森寻求 23.5 亿美元的收购债务
item.description: Patterson Companies Inc.是一家从牙科设备到宠物和牲畜用药的供应商。【原文：Banks are lining up approximately $2.35 billion in debt to support the proposed leveraged buyout of Patterson Companies Inc., a supplier of everything from dental equipment to drugs for pets and livestock.】

item.title: 在广泛的风险反弹中，加密 Altcoins 的表现优于比特币
item.description: 在市场普遍反弹的背景下，另类数字货币的表现优于比特币，因为有迹象表明美国将征收更多有针对性的关税，从而减少了对避险资产的需求。【原文：Alternative digital currencies are outperforming Bitcoin amid a broad-based market rally as signs of more targeted US tariffs reduces demand for haven assets.】

item.title: 关税观点缓和，避险货币波动减弱
item.description: 有报道称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）即将发起的关税浪潮将更具针对性，在此背景下，周一避险货币的隐含波动率指标进一步放缓，延续了已经持续了很长时间的跌势。【原文：Implied volatility measures on safe-haven currencies eased further on Monday, extending already prolonged declines, amid reports that President Donald Trump’s coming wave of tariffs will be more targeted.】

item.title: 在线杂货商 Zepto 正在洽谈 2.5 亿美元的二次销售，为首次公开募股做准备
item.description: 在线杂货商 Zepto 正在与现有股东商谈出售多达 2.5 亿美元的股权，此举的目的是在这家初创公司寻求于今年晚些时候上市之前，增加印度投资者的持股比例。【原文：Online grocer Zepto is in talks for current stockholders to sell as much as $250 million of their equity, a move aimed at boosting the ownership of Indian investors before the startup seeks to go public later this year.】

item.title: 特朗普经济顾问拒绝关税上调带来的短期痛苦
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的最高经济顾问淡化了关税上调将对美国经济造成短期损害的观点；他说，更大的挑战将是如何将关税从公共部门转移出去。【原文：President Donald Trump’s top economic adviser played down the idea that there will be short-term damage to the US economy from tariff hikes — saying the bigger challenge will be redirecting it away from the public sector.】

item.title: 阿莱格拉-斯特拉顿斯塔默能对科技兄弟说 "不 "吗？
item.description: 本周的主题是数字，以及数字对瑞秋-里夫斯的影响。【原文：This week is all about numbers, and how they are moving against Rachel Reeves.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利牵头 60 多亿美元的 Dun & Bradstreet 债务交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，摩根士丹利正在牵头进行一项超过 60 亿美元的债务融资，以帮助 Clearlake Capital Group 收购 Dun & Bradstreet Holdings Inc.【原文：Morgan Stanley is leading a more than $6 billion debt financing to help Clearlake Capital Group purchase Dun & Bradstreet Holdings Inc., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 空中客车公司首席执行官称美欧潜在关税有可能损害波音公司的利益
item.description: 空中客车公司首席执行官纪尧姆-福瑞（Guillaume Faury）警告说，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普准备在下月初宣布对不同行业征收重大关税，美欧之间任何潜在的关税实际上都可能给他的老对手带来更大的麻烦。【原文：Airbus SE Chief Executive Officer Guillaume Faury cautioned that any potential tariffs between the US and Europe could in fact be more problematic for his arch-rival, as US President Donald Trump prepares to announce major levies across different industries early next month.】

item.title: OpenAI扩大首席运营官职责，Altman专注于研究和产品
item.description: 随着首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）将更多的精力转移到技术方面，OpenAI 正在扩大其首席运营官的角色，并将两名高管提升为首席执行官。【原文：OpenAI is expanding the role of its chief operating officer and elevating two executives to the C-suite as Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman shifts more of his focus to the technical side.】

item.title: 维托尔（Vitol）和贡渥（Gunvor）大举押注铝业，震撼金属市场
item.description: 一些全球最大的能源交易商正在全球金属市场掀起波澜，他们的持仓规模之大，引发了伦敦金属交易所的质疑。【原文：Some of the world’s biggest energy traders are making waves in global metals markets by taking positions so large that they prompted questions from the London Metal Exchange.】

item.title: 特朗普告诉内阁希望美联储降低利率
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在周一的内阁会议上再次呼吁美联储降息，继续就货币政策问题向央行施压。【原文：President Donald Trump reiterated his call for the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates during a Cabinet meeting on Monday, as he continues to push the central bank on monetary policy.】

item.title: 美国延长雪佛龙结束委内瑞拉业务的最后期限
item.description: 在这家总部位于得克萨斯州的石油巨头的游说下，特朗普政府延长了雪佛龙公司停止在委内瑞拉运营的最后期限。【原文：The Trump administration extended Chevron Corp.’s deadline to halt its operations in Venezuela, following lobbying efforts by the Texas-based oil giant.】

item.title: 华尔街发现美国股市最糟糕的下跌已经结束的迹象
item.description: 因美股出现有史以来最快的一次下跌而备受打击的交易员们可能会得到喘息的机会。【原文：Traders battered by one of the fastest US stock slides on record may be poised for a reprieve.】

item.title: 我要相信富足
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 博茨瓦纳考虑新建 615 兆瓦燃煤发电厂
item.description: 博茨瓦纳正在考虑在其主要发电厂附近新建一座 615 兆瓦的燃煤发电站，以缓解该发电厂的发电挑战。【原文：Botswana is contemplating building a new 615-megawatt coal-fired power station near its main generation plant to mitigate generation challenges at the facility.】

item.title: 埃尔多安在投资者的不安中誓言坚持经济政策
item.description: 土耳其总统雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安（Recep Tayyip Erdogan）承诺将继续推行他在 2023 年提出的投资者友好型经济政策，并将其最大竞争对手被拘押所引发的市场波动归咎于反对派。【原文：Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan pledged his commitment to the investor-friendly economy policies he embraced in 2023, blaming the opposition for market volatility spurred by the detention of his biggest rival.】
